newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Kredietbank sees no repeat of 1996 profit growth.
newsitem.headline: Kredietbank sees no repeat of 1996 profit growth.

text.p: Kredietbank said on Thursday that it did not expect to see earnings grow by 13.5 percent in 1997, as they did in 1996.
"We have made a budget for new profit growth this year, but we do not expect to see 13.5 percent," Kredietbank chief executive officer Marcel Cockaerts told a news conference.
He said that the first two months of 1997 had been good and he expected this year to be a good one.
The bank's 1996 group net profit rose 13.5 percent to 13.11 billion francs.
-- Geert De Clercq, Brussels Newsroom +32 2 287 6813, Fax +32 2 230 7710
